name: Asteroid Destroyer (Mitchell Todd)
description:
ASTEROID DESTROYER!
Survive and destroy the oncoming asteroids to protect your ship and stay alive. Acquire score by destroying the asteroids. This game is still currently in development and I plan on adding more features to this game in the future. Follow me for future games and check out my collection. Feel free to donate and I hope you enjoy my mini game. Keep dodging and shooting those asteroids!

INSTRUCTIONS

[Arrow Keys] - Move Ship

[SPACE] / [Left Click] - Shoot Lasers

MacOSx DOWNLOAD Section

IF THIS ERROR HAPPENS WHEN LOADING.

1) Allow your Mac to run the game by opening terminal and typing command: 

xattr -cr /Downloads/Asteroid \Destroyer.app/

"Downloads" - Directory/Folder the game is inside.
"Asteroid \Destroyer.app" - The game executable .app file.

IF THIS ERROR CONTINUES...

2) Override security and privacy settings by running terminal command: 

sudo spct1 --master-disable

3) Then navigate to:

System Preferences > Security & Privacy > Allow apps downloaded from:

4) Enable the button labeled:

"Anywhere".
